Requirement: The Miracle Adept ability.

Just as a dragon may amass their hoard over decades and centuries, so too have you learned to patiently collect wayward fragments of the powers that flow through you. These fragments are yours to keep and form your own personal reserve that grows and grows until its power cannot be contained.

You have a Spiritual Hoard number, an accumulating value that starts at 0. Each time you roll one or more @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{ðŸ•¯ Faith} Dice but do not trigger a Miracle, you may increase your Spiritual Hoard by the number rolled on one of the @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{ðŸ•¯ Faith} Dice. If this causes the new total of your Spiritual Hoard to equal exceed 20, reset your Spiritual Hoard to 0 and immediately trigger a Miracle.
